task: Update api-spec.md to include missing endpoints
details: Endpoints like /stats, /stats/history, /events, /audit-logs, /teams (full CRUD), and MFA setup are documented inconsistently or missing in api-spec.md but present in code.
In dashboard.component.ts:93, there is a placeholder '???' instead of proper labeling/styling for team member roles.
MFA lacks recovery/backup codes. If a user loses their TOTP device, they are locked out unless an admin resets them.
agent/database.py creates 'admin/admin' if no users exist. This should be configurable via env vars or disabled after first run to prevent accidental exposure.
Both agent/models.py (Pydantic) and agent/db_models.py (SQLModel) are used. Consider unifying them to reduce redundancy and conversion overhead.

task: Add missing error handling for LLM timeouts
details: LLM calls in agent/llm_integration.py should have more robust retry logic and circuit breakers to prevent blocking the agent during provider outages.

task: Align Frontend Service with Backend API
details: HubApiService.ts contains some methods (like streamSystemEvents) that might need server-side verification of SSE stability and auth token passing via query params (which is less secure than headers).
